title: Are There Any Songs That Really Speak to You, GD?
body:
I just finished listening to this five times in a row, and I can't stop being amazed by it. Listening to it and reading the lyrics makes me feel like my soul is crying. It really hits the nail on the head with how my life is going.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fNB8VRwCPTM

Have you guys heard any songs in the past that resonated similarly with you?
